name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CopyCat - Screen Recordings to Workflows in Seconds

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CopyCat turns your actions into reusable workflows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Imagine if you could show your computer how to do something once, and it'd automatically do it forever. That's the power of CopyCat. We turn screen recordings into workflows so you don't ever have to do those boring tasks ever again.
